mapper.select: select * from feed where is_hide = false and is_delete = false ORDER BY feed_id DESC LIMIT 10;
select * from feed where is_hide = false and is_delete = false and feed_id <= #{id} ORDER BY feed_id DESC LIMIT 10;
mapper.update: update feed set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, is_hide = #{isHide}, ,is_delete = #{isDelete}, modified_at = sysdate where feed_id = #{feed_id}
update feed set is_delete = true where feed_id = #{id}
